name: Pixel Dogfight
description:
What the hell is happening?! Where are they come from? Why is this happening? How can we stop this? When will be the end?

Pixel Dogfight is an endless top-down-shooter game that is set in a fictional universe where an unknown entities invaded your world. Your task is to eliminate the invaders and save your world.

Controls: Movement:Arrow KeysFire/Shoot:Spacebar
Switch Weapon:TabCall Reinforcements:
E
Pause:
Esc
Skip Dialogue:Left Mouse ClickContinue Dialogue:Spacebar Credits:
  • Kenney.nl for the wonderful art assets.
  • Chosic.com for the background music.
  • Chiptone and Bfxr for the sound effects.
Bug Report/Suggestions:

You can write your issues or suggestions on the comments section or you can send me an email at dev.offbrand@gmail.com.
